00045 using namespace std;
00046 
00047 EGS_NDGeometry::EGS_NDGeometry(int ng, EGS_BaseGeometry **G,
00048     const string &Name, bool O) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), N(ng), ortho(O) {
00049     nreg = 1; setup();
00050     for(int j=0; j<N; j++) {
00051         g[j] = G[j]; n[j] = nreg; nreg *= g[j]->regions();
00052         if( !g[j]->isConvex() ) is_convex = false;
00053     }
00054     n[N] = nreg;
00055 }
00056 
00057 EGS_NDGeometry::EGS_NDGeometry(vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &G,
00058     const string &Name, bool O) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), N(G.size()), ortho(O){
00059     nreg = 1; setup();
00060     for(int j=0; j<N; j++) {
00061         g[j] = G[j]; n[j] = nreg; nreg *= g[j]->regions();
00062         if( !g[j]->isConvex() ) is_convex = false;
00063     }
00064     n[N] = nreg;
00065 }
00066 
00067 EGS_NDGeometry::~EGS_NDGeometry() {
00068     for(int j=0; j<N; j++) {
00069         int ref = g[j]->deref(); if( !ref ) delete g[j];
00070     }
00071     delete [] n; delete [] g;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void EGS_NDGeometry::setup() {
00075     n = new int [N+1]; g = new EGS_BaseGeometry* [N];
00076 }
00077 
00078 void EGS_NDGeometry::printInfo() const {
00079     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00080     egsInformation(" number of dimensions = %d\n",N);
00081     for(int j=0; j<N; j++)
00082         egsInformation(" dimension %d = %s (type %s)\n",
00083                 j+1,g[j]->getName().c_str(),g[j]->getType().c_str());
00084     egsInformation(
00085             "=======================================================\n");
00086 }
00087 
00088 void EGS_NDGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *input, int nmed, const int *mind) {
00089     EGS_Input *i; med = mind[0];
00090     while( (i = input->takeInputItem("set medium")) ) {
00091         vector<int> inp;
00092         int err = i->getInput("set medium",inp); delete i;
00093         if( !err ) {
00094             if( inp.size() == 2 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[0],mind[inp[1]]);
00095             else if( inp.size() == 3 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]]);
00096             else if( inp.size() == 4 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]],
00097                     inp[3]);
00098             else if( inp.size() == 2*N+1 ) setM(0,0,inp,inp[2*N]);
00099             else egsWarning("EGS_NDGeometry::setMedia(): found %dinputs\n"
00100               "in a 'set medium' input. 2, 3, 4, or %d are allowed\n",2*N+1);
00101         }
00102         else egsWarning("EGS_NDGeometry::setMedia(): wrong 'set medium'"
00103                 " input\n");
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 void EGS_NDGeometry::setM(int ibase, int idim,
00108         const vector<int> &ranges, int medium) {
00109     int istart = ranges[2*idim], iend = ranges[2*idim+1];
00110     if( istart < 0 ) istart = 0;
00111     int ndim = n[idim+1];
00112     for(int i=0; i<=idim; i++) ndim /= n[i];
00113     if( iend > ndim ) iend = ndim;
00114     if( idim < N-1 ) for(int j=istart; j<iend; j++)
00115         setM(ibase+j*n[idim],idim+1,ranges,medium);
00116     else for(int j=istart; j<iend; j++)
00117         setMedium(ibase+j*n[idim],ibase+j*n[idim]+1,medium);
00118 }

00120 #ifdef EXPLICIT_XYZ
00121 
00122 string EGS_XYZGeometry::type = "EGS_XYZGeometry";
00123 
00124 EGS_XYZGeometry::EGS_XYZGeometry(EGS_PlanesX *Xp, EGS_PlanesY *Yp,
00125         EGS_PlanesZ *Zp, const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name),
00126         xp(Xp), yp(Yp), zp(Zp) {
00127     nx = xp->regions(); ny = yp->regions(); nz = zp->regions();
00128     nxy = nx*ny; nreg = nxy*nz;
00129     xp->ref(); yp->ref(); zp->ref();
00130     xpos = xp->getPositions();
00131     ypos = yp->getPositions();
00132     zpos = zp->getPositions();
00133 }
00134 
00135 EGS_XYZGeometry::~EGS_XYZGeometry() {
00136     if( !xp->deref() ) delete xp;
00137     if( !yp->deref() ) delete yp;
00138     if( !zp->deref() ) delete zp;
00139 }
00140 
00141 void EGS_XYZGeometry::printInfo() const {
00142     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00143     xp->printInfo(); yp->printInfo(); zp->printInfo();
00144     egsInformation(
00145             "=======================================================\n");
00146 }
00147 
00148 void EGS_XYZGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *input, int nmed, const int *mind) {
00149     EGS_Input *i; med = mind[0];
00150     while( (i = input->takeInputItem("set medium")) ) {
00151         vector<int> inp;
00152         int err = i->getInput("set medium",inp); delete i;
00153         if( !err ) {
00154             if( inp.size() == 2 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[0],mind[inp[1]]);
00155             else if( inp.size() == 3 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]]);
00156             else if( inp.size() == 4 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]],
00157                    inp[3]);
00158             else if( inp.size() == 7 ) {
00159                 int is = inp[0], ie = inp[1];
00160                 if( is < 0 ) is = 0; if( ie > nx-1 ) ie = nx-1;
00161                 int js = inp[2], je = inp[3];
00162                 if( js < 0 ) js = 0; if( je > nxy/nx-1 ) je = nxy/nx-1;
00163                 int ks = inp[4], ke = inp[5];
00164                 if( ks < 0 ) ks = 0; if( ke > nreg/nxy-1 ) ke = nreg/nxy-1;
00165                 //egsInformation("setting medium to %d between %d %d %d %d "
00166                 //        "%d %d\n",mind[inp[6]],is,ie,js,je,ks,ke);
00167                 for(int i=is; i<=ie; i++) {
00168                     for(int j=js; j<=je; j++) {
00169                         for(int k=ks; k<=ke; k++) {
00170                             int ireg = i + j*nx + k*nxy;
00171                             //egsWarning("set: %d %d %d %d   %d\n",
00172                             //        i,j,k,ireg,mind[inp[6]]);
00173                             setMedium(ireg,ireg,mind[inp[6]]);
00174                         }
00175                     }
00176                 }
00177             }
00178             else if( inp.size() == 10 ) {
00179                 int is = inp[0], ie = inp[1], idelta = inp[2];
00180                 if( is < 0 ) is = 0; if( ie > nx-1 ) ie = nx-1;
00181                 if( idelta <= 0 ) idelta = 1;
00182                 int js = inp[3], je = inp[4], jdelta = inp[5];
00183                 if( js < 0 ) js = 0; if( je > nxy/nx-1 ) je = nxy/nx-1;
00184                 if( jdelta <= 0 ) jdelta = 1;
00185                 int ks = inp[6], ke = inp[7], kdelta = inp[8];
00186                 if( ks < 0 ) ks = 0; if( ke > nreg/nxy-1 ) ke = nreg/nxy-1;
00187                 if( kdelta <= 0 ) kdelta = 1;
00188                 //egsInformation("setting medium to %d between %d %d %d %d "
00189                 //        "%d %d\n",mind[inp[6]],is,ie,js,je,ks,ke);
00190                 for(int i=is; i<=ie; i+=idelta) {
00191                     for(int j=js; j<=je; j+=jdelta) {
00192                         for(int k=ks; k<=ke; k+=kdelta) {
00193                             int ireg = i + j*nx + k*nxy;
00194                             //egsWarning("set: %d %d %d %d   %d\n",
00195                             //        i,j,k,ireg,mind[inp[6]]);
00196                             setMedium(ireg,ireg,mind[inp[9]]);
00197                         }
00198                     }
00199                 }
00200             }
00201             else egsWarning("EGS_XYZGeometry::setMedia(): found %dinputs\n"
00202               "in a 'set medium' input. 2, 3, 4, 7, or 10 are allowed\n");
00203         }
00204         else egsWarning("EGS_XYZGeometry::setMedia(): wrong 'set medium'"
00205                 " input\n");
00206     }
00207 }
00208 
00209 EGS_XYZGeometry* EGS_XYZGeometry::constructGeometry(const char *dens_file,
00210         const char *ramp_file, int dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile) {
00211     const static char *func = "EGS_XYZGeometry::constructGeometry";
00212     if( !dens_file || !ramp_file ) return 0;
00213     ifstream ramp(ramp_file);
00214     if( !ramp ) {
00215         egsWarning("%s: failed to open CT ramp file %s\n",func,ramp_file); return 0;
00216     }
00217     vector<string> med_names; vector<EGS_Float> rho_min,rho_max,rho_def;
00218 
00219     if( dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile == 2 ) {
00220         // interfile format of data
00221         int meds; ramp >> meds;
00222         for(int i=0; i < meds; i++) {
00223             string medname; EGS_Float rmin,rmax,rdef;
00224             ramp >> rmin >> rmax >> medname;
00225             rdef=(rmin+rmax) / 2.0; // is this correct definition of rdef ??
00226             if( ramp.eof() || ramp.fail() || !ramp.good() ) break;
00227             egsInformation("Using medium %s for rho=%g...%g\n",medname.c_str(),
00228                     rmin,rmax);
00229             med_names.push_back(medname);
00230             rho_min.push_back(rmin); rho_max.push_back(rmax+1);
00231             rho_def.push_back(rdef);
00232         }
00233     } else while(1) {
00234         // other format of data
00235         string medname; EGS_Float rmin,rmax,rdef;
00236         ramp >> medname >> rmin >> rmax >> rdef;
00237         if( ramp.eof() || ramp.fail() || !ramp.good() ) break;
00238         egsInformation("Using medium %s for rho=%g...%g\n",medname.c_str(),
00239                 rmin,rmax);
00240         med_names.push_back(medname);
00241         rho_min.push_back(rmin); rho_max.push_back(rmax);
00242         rho_def.push_back(rdef);
00243     }
00244     if( med_names.size() < 1 ) {
00245         egsWarning("%s: no media defined in the CT ramp "
00246                 "file %s!\n",func,ramp_file); return 0;
00247     }
00248     int Nx, Ny, Nz; EGS_Float *xx, *yy, *zz; float *rho;
00249     if( dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile == 0 ) {
00250         int my_endian = egsGetEndian();
00251         if( my_endian < 0 ) egsFatal("%s: machine has an unknown"
00252                 " endianess!\n",func);
00253         ifstream dens(dens_file,ios::binary);
00254         if( !dens ) {
00255             egsWarning("%s: failed to open density matrix file "
00256                     "%s\n",func,dens_file); return 0;
00257         }
00258         char their_endian;
00259         dens.read(&their_endian,1);
00260         if( their_endian != 0 && their_endian != 1 )
00261             egsFatal("%s: density data created on a machine with"
00262                     " unknown endianess!\n",func);
00263         bool swap = my_endian != their_endian;
00264         dens.read((char *) &Nx,sizeof(int)); if( swap ) egsSwapBytes(&Nx);
00265         dens.read((char *) &Ny,sizeof(int)); if( swap ) egsSwapBytes(&Ny);
00266         dens.read((char *) &Nz,sizeof(int)); if( swap ) egsSwapBytes(&Nz);
00267         if( Nx < 1 || Ny < 1 || Nz < 1 ) {
00268             egsWarning("%s: invalid density matrix file: "
00269                     " Nx=%d Ny=%d Nz=%d\n",func,Nx,Ny,Nz); return 0;
00270         }
00271         float *x = new float [Nx+1];
00272         float *y = new float [Ny+1];
00273         float *z = new float [Nz+1];
00274         dens.read((char *)x, (Nx+1)*sizeof(float));
00275         if( dens.eof() || dens.fail() || !dens.good() ) {
00276             egsWarning("%s: error while reading %d x-planes from"
00277                     " file %s\n",func,Nx+1,dens_file);
00278             delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z; return 0;
00279         }
00280         dens.read((char *)y, (Ny+1)*sizeof(float));
00281         if( dens.eof() || dens.fail() || !dens.good() ) {
00282             egsWarning("%s: error while reading %d y-planes from"
00283                     " file %s\n",func,Ny+1,dens_file);
00284             delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z; return 0;
00285         }
00286         dens.read((char *)z, (Nz+1)*sizeof(float));
00287         if( dens.eof() || dens.fail() || !dens.good() ) {
00288             egsWarning("%s: error while reading %d z-planes from"
00289                     " file %s\n",func,Nz+1,dens_file);
00290             delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z; return 0;
00291         }
00292         if( swap ) {
00293             int j;
00294             for(j=0; j<Nx; j++) egsSwapBytes(&x[j]);
00295             for(j=0; j<Ny; j++) egsSwapBytes(&y[j]);
00296             for(j=0; j<Nz; j++) egsSwapBytes(&z[j]);
00297         }
00298         {
00299             int j;
00300             xx = new EGS_Float [Nx+1]; for(j=0; j<=Nx; j++) xx[j] = x[j];
00301             yy = new EGS_Float [Ny+1]; for(j=0; j<=Ny; j++) yy[j] = y[j];
00302             zz = new EGS_Float [Nz+1]; for(j=0; j<=Nz; j++) zz[j] = z[j];
00303             delete [] x; delete [] y; delete [] z;
00304         }
00305         rho = new float [Nx*Ny*Nz];
00306         dens.read((char *)rho, Nx*Ny*Nz*sizeof(float));
00307         if( dens.fail() ) {
00308             egsWarning("%s: failed reading mass densities from density matrux file\n",func);
00309             delete [] rho; delete [] xx; delete [] yy; delete [] zz; return 0;
00310         }
00311         if( swap ) {
00312             for(int j=0; j<Nx*Ny*Nz; j++) egsSwapBytes(&rho[j]);
00313         }
00314     }
00315     else if( dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile == 2) {
00316         ifstream h_file(dens_file);
00317         if( !h_file ) {
00318             egsWarning("%s: failed to open the interfile header %s\n",func,dens_file); return 0;
00319         }
00320         string data_file("");
00321         int data_type = -1;
00322         float scale_x=0.0, scale_y=0.0, scale_z=0.0;
00323         while(1) {
00324             string line, key, value; size_t pos;
00325             getline(h_file, line);
00326             if( h_file.eof() || h_file.fail() || !h_file.good() ) break;
00327 
00328             pos = line.find(":=");
00329             if( pos == string::npos ) continue;
00330             key = line.substr(0, int(pos));
00331             value = line.substr(int(pos)+2);
00332             while ((key[0] == '!') || (key[0] == ' ')) key.erase(0,1);
00333             while (key[key.length()-1] == ' ') key.erase(key.length()-1, 1);
00334             while (value[0] == ' ') value.erase(0,1);
00335             while (value[value.length()-1] == ' ') value.erase(value.length()-1, 1);
00336 
00337             if ( key ==  "matrix size [1]" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Nx);  }
00338             else if ( key ==  "matrix size [2]" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Ny);  }
00339             else if ( ( key ==  "number of slices" ) || (key ==  "number of images") ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Nz); }
00340             else if ( key ==  "scaling factor (mm/pixel) [1]" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_x); }
00341             else if ( key ==  "scaling factor (mm/pixel) [2]" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_y); }
00342             else if ( key ==  "slice thickness (pixels)" ) { sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_z); } // ????????????????
00343             else if ( key ==  "name of data file" ) { data_file = value; }
00344             else if ( key ==  "number format" ) {
00345                 if( (value == "float") || (value == "FLOAT") ) data_type = 0;
00346                 else if( (value == "unsigned integer") || (value == "UNSIGNED INTEGER") ) data_type = 1;
00347                 else egsWarning("%s: unrecognised 'number format' type: %s \n",func,value.c_str());
00348             }
00349         }
00350         if( Nx < 1 || Ny < 1 || Nz < 1 || scale_x <= 0.0 || scale_y <= 0.0 || scale_z <= 0.0 || data_file == "" || data_type == -1) {
00351             egsWarning("%s: invalid interfile header information: "
00352                     "Nx=%d Ny=%d Nz=%d scale_x=%f scale_y=%f scale_z=%f "
00353                     "data_file='%s' number_format=%d\n",func,Nx,Ny,Nz,scale_x,scale_y,scale_z,data_file.c_str(),data_type); return 0;
00354         }
00355         ifstream i_file(data_file.c_str(),ios::binary);
00356         if( !i_file ) {
00357             egsWarning("%s: failed to open interfile data "
00358                     "%s\n",func,data_file.c_str()); return 0;
00359         }
00360         scale_x /= 10.0; scale_y /= 10.0; scale_z /= 10.0; // convert to cm
00361         {
00362             int j;
00363             xx = new EGS_Float [Nx+1]; for(j=0; j<=Nx; j++) xx[j] = -(float)Nx*scale_x/2.0 + j*scale_x;
00364             yy = new EGS_Float [Ny+1]; for(j=0; j<=Ny; j++) yy[j] = -(float)Ny*scale_y/2.0 + j*scale_y;
00365             zz = new EGS_Float [Nz+1]; for(j=0; j<=Nz; j++) zz[j] = -(float)Nz*scale_z/2.0 + j*scale_z;
00366         }
00367         rho = new float [Nx*Ny*Nz];
00368         if (data_type == 0) {
00369             i_file.read((char *)rho, Nx*Ny*Nz*sizeof(float));
00370         } else {
00371             unsigned short int *rho_tmp = new unsigned short int [Nx*Ny*Nz];
00372             i_file.read((char *)rho_tmp, (Nx*Ny*Nz)*sizeof(unsigned short int));
00373             for (int cc = 0; cc<Nx*Ny*Nz; cc++) rho[cc] = (float) (rho_tmp[cc]);
00374             delete [] rho_tmp;
00375         }
00376         if( i_file.fail() ) {
00377            egsWarning("%s: failed reading interfile data\n",func);
00378            delete [] rho; delete [] xx; delete [] yy; delete [] zz; return 0;
00379         }
00380     } else {
00381         ifstream data(dens_file);
00382         if( !data ) {
00383             egsWarning("%s: failed to open .egsphant file %s\n",func,dens_file); return 0;
00384         }
00385         int nmed; data >> nmed;
00386         if( data.fail() ) {
00387             egsWarning("%s: failed reading number of media\n",func); return 0;
00388         }
00389         char buf [1024]; int imed;
00390         data.getline(buf,1023);
00391         for(imed=0; imed<nmed; ++imed) {
00392             data.getline(buf,1023);
00393             if( data.fail() ) {
00394                 egsWarning("%s: failed reading medium name for %d'th medium\n",func,imed+1);
00395             }
00396             //egsInformation("Got line <%s>\n",buf);
00397         }
00398         // ignore estepe
00399         EGS_Float dum; for(imed=0; imed<nmed; ++imed) data >> dum;
00400         data >> Nx >> Ny >> Nz;
00401         if( data.fail() ) {
00402             egsWarning("%s: failed reading number of voxels\n",func); return 0;
00403         }
00404         xx = new EGS_Float [Nx+1]; yy = new EGS_Float [Ny+1]; zz = new EGS_Float [Nz+1];
00405         int j;
00406         for(j=0; j<=Nx; ++j) data >> xx[j];
00407         if( data.fail() ) {
00408             egsWarning("%s: failed reading x-planes\n",func);
00409             delete [] xx; delete [] yy; delete [] zz; return 0;
00410         }
00411         for(j=0; j<=Ny; ++j) data >> yy[j];
00412         if( data.fail() ) {
00413             egsWarning("%s: failed reading y-planes\n",func);
00414             delete [] xx; delete [] yy; delete [] zz; return 0;
00415         }
00416         for(j=0; j<=Nz; ++j) data >> zz[j];
00417         if( data.fail() ) {
00418             egsWarning("%s: failed reading z-planes\n",func);
00419             delete [] xx; delete [] yy; delete [] zz; return 0;
00420         }
00421         int nr = Nx*Ny*Nz; int med;
00422         //for(j=0; j<nr; ++j) data >> med;
00423         data.getline(buf,1023);
00424         for(int iz=0; iz<Nz; ++iz) {
00425             for(int iy=0; iy<Ny; ++iy) data.getline(buf,1023);
00426             data.getline(buf,1023);
00427         }
00428         if( data.fail() ) {
00429             egsWarning("%s: failed reading media indeces matrix\n",func);
00430             delete [] xx; delete [] yy; delete [] zz; return 0;
00431         }
00432         rho = new float [nr];
00433         for(j=0; j<nr; ++j) data >> rho[j];
00434         if( data.fail() ) {
00435             egsWarning("%s: failed reading mass density matrix\n",func);
00436             delete [] xx; delete [] yy; delete [] zz; delete [] rho; return 0;
00437         }
00438     }
00439     EGS_PlanesX *xp = new EGS_PlanesX(Nx+1,xx,"",EGS_XProjector("x-planes"));
00440     EGS_PlanesY *yp = new EGS_PlanesY(Ny+1,yy,"",EGS_YProjector("y-planes"));
00441     EGS_PlanesZ *zp = new EGS_PlanesZ(Nz+1,zz,"",EGS_ZProjector("z-planes"));
00442     EGS_XYZGeometry *result = new EGS_XYZGeometry(xp,yp,zp);
00443     EGS_Float rhomin=1e30,rhomax=0; int j;
00444     for(j=0; j<Nx*Ny*Nz; j++) {
00445         if( rho[j] > rhomax ) rhomax = rho[j];
00446         if( rho[j] < rhomin ) rhomin = rho[j];
00447     }
00448     egsInformation("Min. density found: %g\n",rhomin);
00449     egsInformation("Max. density found: %g\n",rhomax);
00450     int nmed = med_names.size();
00451     int *imed = new int [nmed];
00452     for(j=0; j<nmed; j++) imed[j] = -2;
00453     for(j=0; j<Nx*Ny*Nz; j++) {
00454         int i;
00455         for(i=0; i<nmed; i++) {
00456             if( rho[j] >= rho_min[i] && rho[j] < rho_max[i] ) break;
00457         }
00458         if( i >= nmed ) {
00459             egsWarning("%s: no material defined for density %g, leaving voxel %d"
00460                     " as vacuum\n",func,rho[j],j);
00461             result->setMedium(j,j,-1);
00462         }
00463         else {
00464             if( imed[i] < -1 ) {
00465                 imed[i] = addMedium(med_names[i]);
00466                 egsInformation("Using medium %s as mednum %d\n",
00467                         med_names[i].c_str(),imed[i]);
00468             }
00469             result->setMedium(j,j,imed[i]);
00470             if( rho_def[i] > 0 ) {
00471                 EGS_Float rrho = rho[j]/rho_def[i];
00472                 if( fabs(rrho-1) > 1e-4 )
00473                     result->setRelativeRho(j,j,rrho);
00474             }
00475         }
00476     }
00477     delete [] rho; delete [] imed;
00478     return result;
00479 }
00480 
00481 string EGS_DeformedXYZ::def_type = "EGS_DeformedXYZ";
00482 
00483 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::tetrahedra[] = {0,2,3,6,   0,6,3,7,   0,4,6,7,
00484                                       7,0,1,3,   7,1,0,4,   7,5,1,4};
00485 
00486 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::plane_order[] = {0,1,2,  0,2,3,  0,3,1,  1,3,2};
00487 
00488 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::enter_tetra1[] = {0, 3, 4, 0, 0, 2};
00489 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::enter_plane1[] = {1, 1, 1, 3, 0, 3};
00490 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::enter_tetra2[] = {2, 5, 5, 1, 3, 5};
00491 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::enter_plane2[] = {0, 0, 2, 3, 2, 2};
00492 
00493 
00494 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::tetra_data[] = {
00495      2,-1,  2,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 0
00496     -1, 0,  1,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 0
00497      0,-1,  3,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 0
00498      1, 1,  4,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 0
00499 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00500     -1, 0,  0,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 1
00501     -1, 0,  3,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 1
00502     -1, 0,  2,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 1
00503      1, 1,  5,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 1
00504 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00505      0,-1,  5,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 2
00506     -1, 0,  1,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 2
00507     -1, 0,  4,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 2
00508      2, 1,  0,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 2
00509 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00510     -1, 0,  4,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 3
00511      0, 1,  0,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 3
00512     -1, 0,  1,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 3
00513      2,-1,  5,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 3
00514 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00515     -1, 0,  3,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 4
00516     -1, 0,  2,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 4
00517     -1, 0,  5,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 4
00518      1,-1,  0,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 4
00519 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00520      0, 1,  2,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 5
00521     -1, 0,  4,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 5
00522      2, 1,  3,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 5
00523      1,-1,  1    // plane 3 in tetrahedron 5
00524 };
00525 
00526 
00527 EGS_DeformedXYZ::EGS_DeformedXYZ(EGS_PlanesX *Xp, EGS_PlanesY *Yp,
00528     EGS_PlanesZ *Zp, const char *defFile, const string &Name) :
00529     EGS_XYZGeometry(Xp,Yp,Zp,Name), vectors(0) {
00530     setDeformations(defFile);
00531     np[0] = nx; np[1] = ny; np[2] = nz;
00532     nxyp1 = nx + ny + 1;
00533 }
00534 
00535 int EGS_DeformedXYZ::setDeformations(const char *defFile) {
00536     ifstream data(defFile,ios::binary);
00537     if( !data ) {
00538         egsWarning("Failed to open deformations file %s\n",defFile);
00539         return 1;
00540     }
00541     int nvec;
00542     data.read((char *)&nvec,sizeof(int));
00543     int nneed = (nx+1)*(ny+1)*(nz+1);
00544     if( nvec != nneed ) {
00545         egsWarning("Inconsistent deformations file: %d instead of %d vectors\n",
00546                 nvec,nneed); return 2;
00547     }
00548     if( !vectors ) vectors = new EGS_Vector [nvec];
00549     float tmp[3]; int i,j,k;
00550     for(j=0; j<nvec; ++j)  {
00551         data.read((char *)tmp,3*sizeof(float));
00552         if( data.fail() ) {
00553             egsWarning("Error while readinf vector %d from file\n",j+1);
00554             return 3;
00555         }
00556         vectors[j] = EGS_Vector(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00557     }
00558 
00559     // add plane positions to vectors
00560     for(k=0; k<=nz; ++k) for(j=0; j<=ny; ++j) for(i=0; i<=nx; ++i) {
00561         int index = i + j*(nx+1) + k*(nx+1)*(ny+1);
00562         vectors[index] += EGS_Vector(xpos[i],ypos[j],zpos[k]);
00563     }
00564 
00565     for(j=0; j<24; ++j) {
00566         int i = tetrahedra[j];
00567         switch (i) {
00568             case 0: tnodes[j] = 0; break;
00569             case 1: tnodes[j] = 1; break;
00570             case 2: tnodes[j] = nx+1; break;
00571             case 3: tnodes[j] = nx+2; break;
00572             case 4: tnodes[j] = (nx+1)*(ny+1); break;
00573             case 5: tnodes[j] = (nx+1)*(ny+1)+1; break;
00574             case 6: tnodes[j] = (nx+1)*(ny+1)+nx+1; break;
00575             case 7: tnodes[j] = (nx+1)*(ny+1)+nx+2; break;
00576         }
00577     }
00578 
00579     nreg = 6*nx*ny*nz;
00580 
00581     return 0;
00582 }
00583 
00584 EGS_DeformedXYZ::~EGS_DeformedXYZ() {
00585     if( vectors ) delete [] vectors;
00586 }
00587 
00588 string EGS_XYZRepeater::type = "EGS_XYZRepeater";
00589 
00590 EGS_XYZRepeater::EGS_XYZRepeater(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax,
00591                             EGS_Float ymin, EGS_Float ymax,
00592                             EGS_Float zmin, EGS_Float zmax,
00593                             int Nx, int Ny, int Nz,
00594                             EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00595                             const string &Name) :
00596     EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), g(G), nx(Nx), ny(Ny), nz(Nz) {
00597     dx = (xmax - xmin)/nx; dxi = 1/dx; ax = -xmin*dxi;
00598     dy = (ymax - ymin)/ny; dyi = 1/dy; ay = -ymin*dyi;
00599     dz = (zmax - zmin)/nz; dzi = 1/dz; az = -zmin*dzi;
00600     EGS_PlanesX *xp; EGS_PlanesY *yp; EGS_PlanesZ *zp;
00601     xp = new EGS_PlanesX(xmin,dx,nx,"",EGS_XProjector("x-planes"));
00602     yp = new EGS_PlanesY(ymin,dy,ny,"",EGS_YProjector("y-planes"));
00603     zp = new EGS_PlanesZ(zmin,dz,nz,"",EGS_ZProjector("z-planes"));
00604     xyz = new EGS_XYZGeometry(xp,yp,zp);
00605     xyz->ref(); g->ref();
00606     nxy = nx*ny; nxyz = nx*ny*nz; ng = g->regions();
00607     nreg = nxyz*ng + 1;
00608     translation = new EGS_Vector [nxyz];
00609     for(int ix=0; ix<nx; ix++)
00610         for(int iy=0; iy<ny; iy++)
00611             for(int iz=0; iz<nz; iz++)
00612                 translation[ix+iy*nx+iz*nxy] = EGS_Vector(xmin + dx*(0.5+ix),
00613                                                           ymin + dy*(0.5+iy),
00614                                                           zmin + dz*(0.5+iz));
00615 
00616 }
00617 
00618 EGS_XYZRepeater::~EGS_XYZRepeater() {
00619     if( !g->deref() ) delete g;
00620     if( !xyz->deref() ) delete xyz;
00621     delete [] translation;
00622 }
00623 
00624 void EGS_XYZRepeater::printInfo() const {
00625     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00626     egsInformation("%d repetitions between xmin=%g and xmax=%g\n",
00627          nx,xyz->getXPositions()[0],xyz->getXPositions()[nx]);
00628     egsInformation("%d repetitions between ymin=%g and ymax=%g\n",
00629          ny,xyz->getYPositions()[0],xyz->getYPositions()[ny]);
00630     egsInformation("%d repetitions between zmin=%g and zmax=%g\n",
00631          nz,xyz->getZPositions()[0],xyz->getZPositions()[nz]);
00632     const char *med_name = getMediumName(med);
00633     if( med_name ) egsInformation("box is filled with %s\n",med_name);
00634     else  egsInformation("box is filled with vacuum\n");
00635     egsInformation("Repeated geometry:\n");
00636     g->printInfo();
00637 }
00638 
00639 void EGS_XYZGeometry::voxelizeGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00640     string gname;
00641     int err = input->getInput("voxelize geometry",gname);
00642     if( err ) return;
00643     egsInformation("\nEGS_XYZGeometry(%s)\n",name.c_str());
00644     egsInformation("  setting media from geometry %s\n",gname.c_str());
00645     EGS_BaseGeometry *geometry = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gname);
00646     if( !geometry ) {
00647         egsInformation("  this geometry does not exist -> media will be not set.\n");
00648         return;
00649     }
00650     EGS_AffineTransform *T = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(input);
00651     if( region_media ) delete [] region_media;
00652     if( rhor ) { delete [] rhor; rhor = 0; }
00653     region_media = new short [nreg];
00654     bool hrs = geometry->hasRhoScaling();
00655     if( hrs ) {
00656         has_rho_scaling = true; rhor = new EGS_Float [nreg];
00657     }
00658     else has_rho_scaling = false;
00659     EGS_Vector v1(xp->position(0),yp->position(0),zp->position(0));
00660     EGS_Vector v2(xp->position(nx),yp->position(ny),zp->position(nz));
00661     egsInformation("  top/left/front corner   : (%g,%g,%g)\n",v1.x,v1.y,v1.z);
00662     egsInformation("  bottom/right/back corner: (%g,%g,%g)\n",v2.x,v2.y,v2.z);
00663     if( T ) {
00664         egsInformation("  the above are transformed as follows before looking up media:\n");
00665         T->transform(v1); T->transform(v2);
00666         egsInformation("  top/left/front corner   : (%g,%g,%g)\n",v1.x,v1.y,v1.z);
00667         egsInformation("  bottom/right/back corner: (%g,%g,%g)\n",v2.x,v2.y,v2.z);
00668     }
00669     for(int ix=0; ix<nx; ++ix) for(int iy=0; iy<ny; iy++) for(int iz=0; iz<nz; ++iz) {
00670         int ir = ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00671         EGS_Vector v(0.5*(xp->position(ix)+xp->position(ix+1)),
00672                      0.5*(yp->position(iy)+yp->position(iy+1)),
00673                      0.5*(zp->position(iz)+zp->position(iz+1)));
00674         if( T ) T->transform(v);
00675         int ireg = geometry->isWhere(v);
00676         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00677             region_media[ir] = geometry->medium(ireg);
00678             if( hrs ) rhor[ir] = geometry->getRelativeRho(ir);
00679         } else {
00680             region_media[ir] = -1;
00681             if( hrs ) rhor[ir] = 1;
00682         }
00683     }
00684     vector<string> options; options.push_back("no"); options.push_back("yes");
00685     bool delete_geometry = input->getInput("delete geometry",options,0);
00686     if( delete_geometry ) {
00687         if( geometry->deref() == -1 ) {
00688             egsInformation("  deleting geometry %s as requested\n",geometry->getName().c_str());
00689             delete geometry;
00690         }
00691         else {
00692             egsInformation("  not deleting geometry %s as requested due to remaining references\n",
00693                     geometry->getName().c_str());
00694             geometry->ref();
00695         }
00696     }
00697     egsInformation("\n");
00698 }
00699 
00700 const char *err_msg1 = "createGeometry(EGS_XYZRepeater)";
00701 
00702 #endif
00703 
00704 string EGS_NDGeometry::type = "EGS_NDGeometry";
00705 
00706 extern "C" {
00707 
00708 EGS_NDG_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00709 #ifdef EXPLICIT_XYZ
00710     const static char *func = "createGeometry(XYZ)";
00711     string type;
00712     int is_xyz = input->getInput("type",type);
00713     if( !is_xyz && input->compare("EGS_XYZRepeater",type) ) {
00714         string base,medium; vector<EGS_Float> xr, yr, zr;
00715         int err1 = input->getInput("repeated geometry",base);
00716         int err2 = input->getInput("repeat x",xr);
00717         int err3 = input->getInput("repeat y",yr);
00718         int err4 = input->getInput("repeat z",zr);
00719         int err5 = input->getInput("medium",medium);
00720         EGS_BaseGeometry *g = 0;
00721         if( err1 )
00722             egsWarning("%s: missing 'repeated geometry' input\n",err_msg1);
00723         else {
00724             g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(base);
00725             if( !g ) {
00726                 egsWarning("%s: no geometry named %s exists\n",err_msg1,
00727                         base.c_str()); err1 = 1;
00728             }
00729         }
00730         if( err2 || xr.size() != 3 ) {
00731             err1 = 1;
00732             egsWarning("%s: wrong/missing 'repeat x' input\n",err_msg1);
00733         }
00734         if( err3 || yr.size() != 3 ) {
00735             err1 = 1;
00736             egsWarning("%s: wrong/missing 'repeat y' input\n",err_msg1);
00737         }
00738         if( err4 || zr.size() != 3 ) {
00739             err1 = 1;
00740             egsWarning("%s: wrong/missing 'repeat z' input\n",err_msg1);
00741         }
00742         if( err1 ) return 0;
00743         EGS_Float xmin = xr[0], xmax = xr[1]; int nx = (int) (xr[2]+0.1);
00744         if( xmin >= xmax || nx < 1 ) {
00745             egsWarning("%s: wrong 'repeat x' input xmin=%g xmax=%g nx=%d\n",
00746                     xmin,xmax,nx); err1 = 1;
00747         }
00748         EGS_Float ymin = yr[0], ymax = yr[1]; int ny = (int) (yr[2]+0.1);
00749         if( ymin >= ymax || ny < 1 ) {
00750             egsWarning("%s: wrong 'repeat y' input ymin=%g ymax=%g ny=%d\n",
00751                     ymin,ymax,ny); err1 = 1;
00752         }
00753         EGS_Float zmin = zr[0], zmax = zr[1]; int nz = (int) (zr[2]+0.1);
00754         if( zmin >= zmax || nz < 1 ) {
00755             egsWarning("%s: wrong 'repeat z' input zmin=%g zmax=%g nz=%d\n",
00756                     zmin,zmax,nz); err1 = 1;
00757         }
00758         if( err1 ) return 0;
00759 
00760         EGS_XYZRepeater *result =
00761             new EGS_XYZRepeater(xmin,xmax,ymin,ymax,zmin,zmax,nx,ny,nz,g);
00762         result->setName(input);
00763         if( !err5 ) result->setMedium(medium);
00764         result->setXYZLabels(input);
00765         result->setLabels(input);
00766         return result;
00767     }
00768     else if( !is_xyz && input->compare("EGS_XYZGeometry",type) ) {
00769         string dens_file, ramp_file, egsphant_file, interfile_file;
00770         int ierr1 = input->getInput("density matrix",dens_file);
00771         int ierr2 = input->getInput("ct ramp",ramp_file);
00772         int ierr3 = input->getInput("egsphant file",egsphant_file);
00773         int ierr4 = input->getInput("interfile header",interfile_file);
00774         int dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile = -1;
00775         if( !ierr1 ) dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile = 0;
00776         else if( !ierr3 ) { dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile = 1; dens_file = egsphant_file; }
00777         else if( !ierr4 ) { dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile = 2; dens_file = interfile_file; }
00778         if( dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile >= 0 || !ierr2 ) {
00779             if( dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile < 0 ) {
00780                 egsWarning("%s: no 'density matrix', 'egsphant file' or 'interfile header' input\n",func);
00781                 return 0;
00782             }
00783             if( ierr2 ) {
00784                 egsWarning("%s: no 'ct ramp' input\n",func);
00785                 return 0;
00786             }
00787             EGS_XYZGeometry *result =
00788                 EGS_XYZGeometry::constructGeometry(dens_file.c_str(),ramp_file.c_str(),dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile);
00789             result->setName(input); return result;
00790         }
00791         vector<EGS_Float> xpos, ypos, zpos, xslab, yslab, zslab;
00792         int ix = input->getInput("x-planes",xpos);
00793         int iy = input->getInput("y-planes",ypos);
00794         int iz = input->getInput("z-planes",zpos);
00795         int ix1 = input->getInput("x-slabs",xslab);
00796         int iy1 = input->getInput("y-slabs",yslab);
00797         int iz1 = input->getInput("z-slabs",zslab);
00798         int nx, ny, nz;
00799         if( !ix1 ) {
00800             if( xslab.size() != 3 ) {
00801                 egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): exactly 3 inputs are required"
00802                         " when using 'x-slabs' input method\n"); ix1 = 1;
00803             }
00804             else {
00805                 nx = (int) (xslab[2]+0.1);
00806                 if( nx < 1 ) {
00807                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): number of slabs must be"
00808                        " positive!\n"); ix1 = 1;
00809                 }
00810                 if( xslab[1] <= 0 ) {
00811                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): slab thickness must be"
00812                        " positive!\n"); ix1 = 1;
00813                 }
00814             }
00815         }
00816         if( ix && ix1 ) {
00817             egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): wrong/missing 'x-planes' "
00818                     "and 'x-slabs' input\n"); return 0;
00819         }
00820         if( !iy1 ) {
00821             if( yslab.size() != 3 ) {
00822                 egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): exactly 3 inputs are required"
00823                         " when using 'y-slabs' input method\n"); iy1 = 1;
00824             }
00825             else {
00826                 ny = (int) (yslab[2]+0.1);
00827                 if( ny < 1 ) {
00828                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): number of slabs must be"
00829                             " positive!\n"); iy1 = 1;
00830                 }
00831                 if( yslab[1] <= 0 ) {
00832                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): slab thickness must be"
00833                             " positive!\n"); iy1 = 1;
00834                 }
00835             }
00836         }
00837         if( iy && iy1 ) {
00838             egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): wrong/missing 'y-planes' "
00839                     "and 'y-slabs' input\n"); return 0;
00840         }
00841         if( !iz1 ) {
00842             if( zslab.size() != 3 ) {
00843                 egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): exactly 3 inputs are required"
00844                         " when using 'z-slabs' input method\n"); iz1 = 1;
00845             }
00846             else {
00847                 nz = (int) (zslab[2]+0.1);
00848                 if( nz < 1 ) {
00849                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): number of slabs must be"
00850                             " positive!\n"); iz1 = 1;
00851                 }
00852                 if( zslab[1] <= 0 ) {
00853                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): slab thickness must be"
00854                             " positive!\n"); iz1 = 1;
00855                 }
00856             }
00857         }
00858         if( iz && iz1 ) {
00859             egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): wrong/missing 'z-planes' "
00860                     "and 'z-slabs' input\n"); return 0;
00861         }
00862         EGS_PlanesX *xp = !ix1 ?
00863            new EGS_PlanesX(xslab[0],xslab[1],nx,"",EGS_XProjector("x-planes")) :
00864            new EGS_PlanesX(xpos,"",EGS_XProjector("x-planes"));
00865         EGS_PlanesY *yp = !iy1 ?
00866            new EGS_PlanesY(yslab[0],yslab[1],ny,"",EGS_YProjector("y-planes")) :
00867            new EGS_PlanesY(ypos,"",EGS_YProjector("y-planes"));
00868         EGS_PlanesZ *zp = !iz1 ?
00869            new EGS_PlanesZ(zslab[0],zslab[1],nz,"",EGS_ZProjector("z-planes")) :
00870            new EGS_PlanesZ(zpos,"",EGS_ZProjector("z-planes"));
00871         EGS_XYZGeometry *result = new EGS_XYZGeometry(xp,yp,zp);
00872 
00873         if( result ) {
00874             egsWarning("**********************************************\n");
00875             EGS_BaseGeometry *g = result;
00876             result->setName(input);
00877             g->setMedia(input);
00878             result->voxelizeGeometry(input);
00879 
00880             // labels
00881             result->setXYZLabels(input);
00882             g->setLabels(input);
00883         }
00884         return result;
00885     }
00886 #endif
00887     vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> dims;
00888     EGS_Input *ij;
00889     int error = 0;
00890     while( (ij = input->takeInputItem("geometry",false)) != 0 ) {
00891         EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(ij);
00892         if( g ) { dims.push_back(g); g->ref(); }
00893         else error++;
00894         delete ij;
00895     }
00896     vector<string> gnames;
00897     int err1 = input->getInput("dimensions",gnames);
00898     if( !err1 ) {
00899         for(unsigned int j=0; j<gnames.size(); j++) {
00900             EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gnames[j]);
00901             if( g ) { dims.push_back(g); g->ref(); }
00902             else {
00903                 egsWarning("Geometry %s does not exist\n",gnames[j].c_str());
00904                 error++;
00905             }
00906         }
00907     }
00908     if( error ) {
00909         egsWarning("createGeometry(ND_Geometry): %d errors while "
00910           "creating/geting geometries defining individual dimensions\n",error);
00911         return 0;
00912     }
00913     if( dims.size() < 2 ) {
00914         egsWarning("createGeometry(ND_Geometry): why do you want to "
00915                 "construct a ND geometry with a single dimension?\n");
00916         input->print(0,cerr);
00917         for(int j=0; j<gnames.size(); j++) egsWarning("dimension %d: %s\n",
00918                 j+1,gnames[j].c_str());
00919     }
00920     int n_concav = 0;
00921     for(int j=0; j<dims.size(); j++) if( !dims[j]->isConvex() ) n_concav++;
00922     bool is_ok = true;
00923     if( n_concav > 1 ) {
00924         egsWarning("createGeometry(ND_Geometry): a ND geometry can not have "
00925              " more than one non-convex dimension, yours has %d\n",n_concav);
00926         is_ok = false;
00927     }
00928     else if( n_concav == 1 ) {
00929         if( dims[dims.size()-1]->isConvex() ) {
00930             egsWarning("createGeometry(ND_Geometry): the non-convex "
00931               "dimension must be the last dimension\n");
00932             is_ok = false;
00933         }
00934     }
00935     if( !is_ok ) {
00936         for(int j=0; j<dims.size(); j++)
00937             if( dims[j]->deref() ) delete dims[j];
00938         return 0;
00939     }
00940     int hn_method=0; err1 = input->getInput("hownear method",hn_method);
00941     EGS_BaseGeometry *result;
00942     if( !err1 && hn_method == 1 ) result = new EGS_NDGeometry(dims,"",false);
00943     else result = new EGS_NDGeometry(dims);
00944     result->setName(input);
00945     result->setMedia(input);
00946     result->setLabels(input);
00947     return result;
00948 }
00949 
00950 
00951 void EGS_XYZGeometry::setXYZLabels (EGS_Input *input) {
00952 
00953     // x,y,z labels
00954     string inp;
00955     int err;
00956 
00957     err = input->getInput("set x label", inp);
00958     if (!err) xp->setLabels(inp);
00959 
00960     err = input->getInput("set y label", inp);
00961     if (!err) yp->setLabels(inp);
00962 
00963     err = input->getInput("set z label", inp);
00964     if (!err) zp->setLabels(inp);
00965 }
00966 
00967 
00968 int EGS_NDGeometry::ndRegions (int r, int dim, int dimk, int k, vector<int> &regs) {
00969 
00970     // skip looping over selected dimension
00971     if (dim == dimk) {
00972         r += k*n[dimk];
00973         if (dim == N-1) regs.push_back(r);
00974         else ndRegions(r, dim+1, dimk, k, regs);
00975     }
00976 
00977     // last dimension: end recursion and record global region number
00978     else if (dim == N-1) {
00979         for (int j=0; j<g[dim]->regions(); j++) {
00980             regs.push_back(r+j*n[dim]);
00981         }
00982     }
00983 
00984     // keep collecting by recursion
00985     else {
00986         for (int j=0; j<g[dim]->regions(); j++) {
00987             ndRegions(r + j*n[dim], dim+1, dimk, k, regs);
00988         }
00989     }
00990 }
00991 
00992 
00993 void EGS_NDGeometry::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00994 
00995     // label defined in the sub-geometries
00996     vector<int> local_regs;
00997     for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
00998         local_regs.clear();
00999         if (g[i]) g[i]->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01000         if (local_regs.size() == 0) continue;
01001 
01002         // recurse to collect all global regions comprised in each local region
01003         for (int j=0; j<local_regs.size(); j++)
01004             ndRegions(0, 0, i, local_regs[j], regs);
01005     }
01006 
01007     // label defined in self (nd input block)
01008     EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
01009 
01010 }
01011 
01012 
01013 void EGS_XYZGeometry::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
01014 
01015     vector<int> local_regs;
01016 
01017     // x plane labels
01018     local_regs.clear();
01019     xp->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01020     for (int i=0; i<local_regs.size(); i++) {
01021         for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01022             for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01023                 regs.push_back(local_regs[i] + nx*j + nxy*k);
01024             }
01025         }
01026     }
01027 
01028     // y plane labels
01029     local_regs.clear();
01030     yp->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01031     for (int j=0; j<local_regs.size(); j++) {
01032         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01033             for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01034                 regs.push_back(i + nx*local_regs[j] + nxy*k);
01035             }
01036         }
01037     }
01038 
01039     // z plane labels
01040     local_regs.clear();
01041     zp->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01042     for (int k=0; k<local_regs.size(); k++) {
01043         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01044             for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01045                 regs.push_back(i + nx*j + nxy*local_regs[k]);
01046             }
01047         }
01048     }
01049 
01050     // label defined in self (xyz input block)
01051     EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
01052 
01053 }
01054 
01055 
01056 void EGS_XYZRepeater::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
01057 
01058     vector<int> local_regs;
01059 
01060     // label in repeated geometry
01061     local_regs.clear();
01062     g->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01063     for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01064         for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01065             for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01066                 for (int r=0; r<local_regs.size(); r++) {
01067                     regs.push_back(ng*(i + nx*j + nxy*k) + local_regs[r]);
01068                 }
01069             }
01070         }
01071     }
01072 
01073     // x plane labels
01074     local_regs.clear();
01075     xyz->getXLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01076     for (int i=0; i<local_regs.size(); i++) {
01077         for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01078             for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01079                 for (int r=0; r<ng; r++) {
01080                     regs.push_back(ng*(local_regs[i] + nx*j + nxy*k) + r);
01081                 }
01082             }
01083         }
01084     }
01085 
01086     // y plane labels
01087     local_regs.clear();
01088     xyz->getYLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01089     for (int j=0; j<local_regs.size(); j++) {
01090         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01091             for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01092                 for (int r=0; r<ng; r++) {
01093                     regs.push_back(ng*(i + nx*local_regs[j] + nxy*k) + r);
01094                 }
01095             }
01096         }
01097     }
01098 
01099     // z plane labels
01100     local_regs.clear();
01101     xyz->getZLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01102     for (int k=0; k<local_regs.size(); k++) {
01103         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01104             for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01105                 for (int r=0; r<ng; r++) {
01106                     regs.push_back(ng*(i + nx*j + nxy*local_regs[k]) + r);
01107                 }
01108             }
01109         }
01110     }
01111 
01112     // label defined in self (repeater input block)
01113     EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
01114 
01115 }
